channel.title: Apache Video on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Apache Video on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Stunts.
item.description: Remember the video game stunts? It ruled. Today I pulled off a great stunt. I configured a apache and jserv in a chrooted environment. HeHe. it was way fun and quite tough. chrooting rules. there is nothing quite like it. I keep looking around my systems for something else to chroot. Ha. a new hobby..
